alert.note: Alert for Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 11:34AM EDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of east central Baldwin, southern Escambia, northwestern Santa Rosa and Escambia Counties through 1115 AM CDT... At 1034 AM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Atmore to 11 miles east of Bay Minette to 4 miles southeast of Stapleton. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Pensacola, Ferry Pass, Brent, West Pensacola, Ensley, Warrington, Gonzalez, Atmore, Pace, Milton, Goulding, Century, Flomaton, Bagdad, Myrtle Grove, Molino, Jay, Pollard, Bratt and I65 And CR 1. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until noon CDT for south central and southwestern Alabama...and northwestern Florida.

area.areaDesc: Escambia Inland; Santa Rosa Coastal; Santa Rosa Inland
